TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridItem extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow implements class System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer, class System.Web.UI.INamingContainer
Public Class DataGridItem Inherits TableRow Implements IDataItemContainer
public ref class DataGridItem : System::Web::UI::WebControls::TableRow, System::Web::UI::IDataItemContainer

summary.span: 表示 控件中的项（行）。

span.span: Represents an item (row) in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A对象中表示的项 （行）控件，如标题部分、 页脚部分或数据行。A object represents an item (row) in a control, such as a heading section, a footer section, or a data row. 数据项都存储在控件可以通过使用访问的集合属性控件。The data items of a control are stored in a collection that can be accessed by using the property of the control. 你可以使用对象以编程方式访问中的项的属性控件。You can use a object to programmatically access the properties of an item in a control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用对象显示的内容中的每个数据项控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use a object to display the contents of each data item in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，且如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code example uses the single-file code model and might not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). [!code-aspx-csharp[DataGridItemDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridItemDataBound/CS/datagriditemdataboundcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataGridItemDataBound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataGridItemDataBound/VB/datagriditemdataboundvb.aspx#1)]

One of the values.

summary.span: 获取或设置由 控件中的 对象表示的数据项。

span.span: Gets or sets the data item represented by the object in the control.

value.span: 表示 控件中的数据项的 。

span.span: A that represents a data item in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可指定或确定项表示的数据的属性对象在控件。Use the property to specify or determine the properties of a data item represented by the object in the control. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅适用于数据项控件。This property applies only to data items in the control. 属性必须设置为`ListItemType.Item`， `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`， `ListItemType.SelectedItem`，或`ListItemType.EditItem`。The property must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性显示的内容中的数据项控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the contents of the data items in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，且如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code example uses the single-file code model and might not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataGridItem.DataItem Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridItem.DataItem Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataGridItem.DataItem Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataGridItem.DataItem Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取绑定数据源中的 对象的索引。

span.span: Gets the index of the object from the bound data source.

value.span: 绑定数据源中的 的索引。

span.span: The index of the from the bound data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用要获取的索引属性绑定的数据源中的对象。Use the property to get the index of the object from the bound data source. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅适用于数据项控件。This property applies only to data items in the control. 属性对象必须设置为`ListItemType.Item`， `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`， `ListItemType.SelectedItem`，或`ListItemType.EditItem`。The property of the object must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性显示的索引绑定的数据源中的对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the index of the object from the bound data source. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，且如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code example uses the single-file code model and might not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定的索引对象集合控件。Use the property to determine the index of the object from the collection of the control. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅适用于数据项控件。This property applies only to data items in the control. 属性对象必须设置为`ListItemType.Item`， `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`， `ListItemType.SelectedItem`，或`ListItemType.EditItem`。The property of the object must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性显示的索引对象集合控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the index of the object from the collection of the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，且如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code example uses the single-file code model and might not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. summary.span: 获取由 控件中 对象表示的项的类型。

span.span: Gets the type of the item represented by the object in the control.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定中的项的类型控件。Use the property to determine the type of an item in the control. 下表列出了各种项类型。The following table lists the various item types. |项目类型Item Type|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`Header`|标题部分控件。The heading section of the control.| |`Footer`|页脚部分控件。The footer section of the control.| |`Item`|中的项控件。An item in the control.| |`AlternatingItem`|中的交替项控件。An alternating item in the control.| |`SelectedItem`|中的选定的项控件。The selected item in the control.| |`EditItem`|为在中编辑选定的项控件。The item selected for editing in the control.| |`Separator`|项之间的分隔符控件。A separator between the items of the control.| |`Pager`|页上选择部分的控件。The page selection section of the control.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定中的项的类型控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the type of an item in the control. 在中创建项的顺序控件显示的项类型以及。The order in which items are created in the control is displayed along with the item type. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，且如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code example uses the single-file code model and might not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
